page.title: 08VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: Both in Harvington and Salford Priors are two village shops. There is a Post Office which also sells food, papers, drinks etc.. There is a General Store.The General Store in Harvington is also a Freezer Centre. Most people who live in Salford Priors and Harvington do their weekly shopping in Evesham or Redditch and there they buy things like clothes or furniture. Most people also use the village shops about once or twice a week. Most people have things delivered such as milk and newspapers but also bread, lemonade, eggs and beer. Some buy clothes, electrical goods and toys from catalogues.
